content: Regular Shares Savings Plans (RSS) Investments Unit Trust Online Brokerages Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 May 2019Is it possible to transfer all my units from DBS invest saver to Maybank Kim Eng? Or do I just have to stop putting money into DBS and just open account with Maybank Kim Eng instead?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 09 May 2019Unfortunately, you cannot transfer units out from DBS invest saver.You can just leave them there as is and let it grow and continue with Maybank if you wish.Or you could sell them all and use the cash in Maybank.0 comments0
